name: pjcohcli
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c0), chba))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c0), chba))
-| wf(cfv(cpjh, c1), chba, chba)
-| wf(cfv(cpjh, c2), chba, chba)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c0), chba))
-| wf(cfv(cpjh, c1), chba, chba)
-| wf(cfv(cpjh, c2), chba, chba)

body.origin:
|- wf(cfv(cpjh, c1), chba, chba)
-| wcel(c1, cch)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c0), chba))
-| wf(cfv(cpjh, c2), chba, chba)
-| wcel(c1, cch)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ ~H →(((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c2))` c0)∈ ~H)
⊣ ((projh ` c2): ~H → ~H)
⊣ c1 ∈ CH

body.origin:
|- wf(cfv(cpjh, c2), chba, chba)
-| wcel(c2, cch)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(cfv(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c1), cfv(cpjh, c2)), c0), chba))
-| wcel(c1, cch)
-| wcel(c2, cch)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ ~H →(((projh ` c1)∘(projh ` c2))` c0)∈ ~H)
⊣ c1 ∈ CH
⊣ c2 ∈ CH

comment: Closure of composition of projections. (Contributed by NM, 7-Oct-2000.) (New usage is discouraged.)
